duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with C-level executives to develop and execute the growth strategy for the respective vertical.
Initiate and nurture trust-based relationships with key partners in the public and private sector to drive growth and revenue.
Design and develop complex business solutions adapted to the needs and requirements of partners.
Perform competitive analysis alongside modeling and forecasting for optimal market positioning.
Analyze the performance of products and services, establish KPIs for the vertical, and continuously adjust growth strategies for best results.
Meet and exceed set KPIs and periodic targets.
Keep updated on emerging trends and recommend new company offerings to address the needs of partners and customers.
Promote and expand brand awareness among existing and potential business partners.
Lead complex projects and develop processes with minimal guidance.

education_certification.credential: Graduate and/or undergraduate studies in Business, Finance, Economics, or Entrepreneurship preferred.
